card.name: Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
card.text: Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Captain Lannery Storm
card.text: Haste Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
card.text: Vigilance Other creatures you control get +2/+2. Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.

card.name: Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
card.text: Vigilance Other creatures you control get +2/+2. Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.

card.name: Emry, Lurker of the Loch
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, mill four cards. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

card.name: Horobi, Death's Wail
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy that creature.

card.name: Imoti, Celebrant of Bounty
card.text: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.) Spells you cast with mana value 6 or greater have cascade.

card.name: Inga Rune-Eyes
card.text: When Inga Rune-Eyes enters the battlefield, scry 3. When Inga Rune-Eyes dies, draw three cards if three or more creatures died this turn.

card.name: Jegantha, the Wellspring
card.text: Companion — No card in your starting deck has more than one of the same mana symbol in its mana cost. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} any time you could cast a sorcery.) {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. This mana can't be spent to pay generic mana costs.

card.name: Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
card.text: Flash At the beginning of your end step, draw seven cards. Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by seven.

card.name: Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur
card.text: Flash At the beginning of your end step, draw seven cards. Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by seven.

card.name: Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger
card.text: When Kroxa enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless it escaped. Whenever Kroxa enters the battlefield or attacks, each opponent discards a card, then each opponent who didn't discard a nonland card this way loses 3 life. Escape—{B}{B}{R}{R}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger
card.text: When Kroxa enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless it escaped. Whenever Kroxa enters the battlefield or attacks, each opponent discards a card, then each opponent who didn't discard a nonland card this way loses 3 life. Escape—{B}{B}{R}{R}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

card.name: Niv-Mizzet Reborn
card.text: Flying When Niv-Mizzet Reborn enters the battlefield, reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each color pair, choose a card that's exactly those colors from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Niv-Mizzet Reborn
card.text: Flying When Niv-Mizzet Reborn enters the battlefield, reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each color pair, choose a card that's exactly those colors from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer
card.text: Whenever Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token and exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card. Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Sheoldred, Whispering One
card.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Sheoldred, Whispering One
card.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon
card.text: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {B}: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon gains haste until end of turn. {B}{B}: Regenerate Skithiryx.

card.name: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon
card.text: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {B}: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon gains haste until end of turn. {B}{B}: Regenerate Skithiryx.

card.name: Taigam, Ojutai Master
card.text: Instant, sorcery, and Dragon spells you control can't be countered. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, if Taigam, Ojutai Master attacked this turn, that spell gains rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
card.text: First strike Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Urabrask the Hidden
card.text: Creatures you control have haste. Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Urabrask the Hidden
card.text: Creatures you control have haste. Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
card.text: Trample Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced. Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
card.text: Trample Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced. Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, that land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Yedora, Grave Gardener
card.text: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may return it to the battlefield face down under its owner's control. It's a Forest land. (It has no other types or abilities.)

card.name: Zada, Hedron Grinder
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada, Hedron Grinder, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

card.name: Zada, Hedron Grinder
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Zada, Hedron Grinder, copy that spell for each other creature you control that the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.
